mapper.select: SELECT no, noHLog, contents, noDounor, regdate, nickname, profile FROM(SELECT no, noHLog, contents, noDounor, regdate, nickname, profile, rownum r FROM(SELECT c.no no, c.no_hlog noHLog, c.contents contents, c.no_dounor noDounor, c.regdate regdate, d.nickname nickname, d.profile profile FROM hlogcomment c, dounor d WHERE c.no_dounor = d.no) WHERE noHLog = #{noHLog} ORDER BY regdate DESC) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hlogcomment(no, no_dounor, contents, regdate, no_hlog) VALUES (hlogcomment_seq.nextval, #{noDounor}, #{contents}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{noHLog})
